name: BetFury
description: BetFury (https://betfury.io/) is the Social i-Gaming Crypto platform with multicurrency daily Staking payouts. The platform differs by the full cycle of own game development, as well as the development of various sub-services. BetFury has its own token BFG launched on BSC. Our team is interested in creating a bigger, profitable, successful, and enjoyable platform for everyone.
